string.text: The fight is canceled. The challenger chickened out and left the ring. Coward!
It took 10 seconds!
It took 20 seconds!
It took 30 seconds!
It took 40 seconds!
It took 50 seconds!
A minute passed!
A minute passed, and 10 seconds!
A minute passed, and 20 seconds!
It took fifteen minutes!
The battle has begun!

Attention! Attention! Soon the arena will begin a new battle! In the left corner of the arena bloody and always hungry leech! In the right corner of the arena ... people? Yes, man! Everyone calls him Strelok.

Attention! Attention! Soon the arena will begin a new battle! In the left corner of the arena, he knows 'Fou Yuck', he is able to bend spoons in his ass! In the right corner of the arena hero, whose search never ends! Everyone calls him Strelok.
So what? The enemy killed the challenger. That's was cool!
So what? The challenger did kill the enemy, but not in the timea alloted and lost!

Attention! Attention! Soon, the arena will begin a new battle! In the left corner of the arena white and fluffy, but incredibly evil, a pseudodog! In the right corner of the arena came out of nowhere, going nowhere. Everyone calls him Strelok.

Attention! Attention! Soon, the arena will begin a new battle! In the left corner of the arena, you know it, you love it. And he hates you. This is a beast! In the right corner of the arena is still alive Strelok.

Attention! Attention! Soon, the arena will begin a new battle! In the left corner of the arena a 'martial arts' expert in nutrition and Snork! In the right corner of the arena a man without a past. Everyone calls him Strelok.
Time's up! Challenger lost, but still fighting for his life!
So what? The challenger had killed the enemy in the required time and won!
As you wish.
Stalker my friend! Please do not go away, help us! Anarchists shot down our helicopter and now we will get killed. We have injured, we need your help!
He he, that's all. Do not have your helicopter! Now you get the shaft!
All right Wolf you dog face. They flew in on a military helicopter. Now they have you as a puppy!
Professor escaped! Urgent, all go in pursuit of Kruglov! He could not have gone far.
Strelok, help me! Killing me!
Manage these bastards. This ain't school where we would be putting forth an ultimatum.
If you attack I will destroy the information. 'Between the lines dude', not my work.
If you do not want me to destroy the research results then stay away.
Wolf, takes his dogs, while their tails are between their legs!
All conversations are over. Let us start shooting.
Man let's finish them off! The point is, let's kill these guys.
Strelok. If you support us we will be indebted.
They come for us? Strelok stop them!
In short you idiot scientist. You give me the results or you will leave in a body bag.
Kruglov I do not know Latin, but I know the language of weapons. Do you want to give up your life or give up the information?
Professor you're a smart person. Give up the information and then get lost.

Kruglov, you still do not understand? We shot down your freak'n helicopter and we need the information that you have. Once you give it to us you are can leave. This is your last chance to get out of here, let's talk and split up.
Urgent help needed here! Near Radar my guys caught a wacky stalker and now they are trying to interrogate him.
Strelok are you crazy? Immediately stop shooting! That's an order!
Strelok immediately cease fire! If you disobey the order, you're dead meat!
Strelok, for violation of the 'Duty' Code, your expelled from the group. From now on you're our enemy.
Strelok, you disobeyed an order! Now you're dead! 'Duty' does not forgive!
Cease fire, in the territory of 'Duty'! Shooting is prohibited! Disobey and be punished!
Attention! For violation of the law on the use of weapons in the territory of 'Duty' Strelok is declared a criminal.
Attention! Discovered a killer! Order to all individuals in 'Duty'! Urgent to destroy this killer!
Stalker, help! We were attacked by mercenaries, half of our guys are lost. Help us, we will be indebted.
Help us to break through the ambush near the plant. I sent you the coordinates. Be careful, Wolf is with his thugs near the helicopter.
